## Slide 2 - Calc ideal weight

```{r, echo=TRUE } #fig.height=5, fig.width=5}

  idealWeight <- 1;
  gender <- "woman" # or "man"
  height <- 193;

  toInch = height / 2.54;  # height is in cm
  feet5 <- 12 * 5;

  if( toInch > feet5 ){
      toInch <- toInch - feet5;
  } else {
      toInch <- 0;
  }
  
  if( gender == "man" ){
    idealWeight <- 52 + 1.9 * toInch;
  } else { # gender = "woman"
    idealWeight <- 49 + 1.7 * toInch;
  }
  idealWeight # in Kg
```
